column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We came here based off of great Yelp reviews
column2: and were not disappointed. The only downside to the experience was the hour and a half wait for a table
column4: most were trying to cram inside the small wait area to wait it out. But
column5: if you can get past the crowds
column6: this place is amazing. We had their signature berry pancakes
column7: the corned beef skillet and the burrito-all fantastic. The fresh squeezed orange juice was just that
column8: and their coffee bar had everything you could want
column9: even pour overs. I would highly recommend this place for brunch when you are in town. We will be back!
